a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: People living in democracies and autocracies, World

Political regimes are based on the
classification
by Lührmann et al. (2018) and the estimates by V-Dem ’s
